title: Small Garden Planting: Durango Electro Culture   SD 480p

tasks.task: Pruning pepper plants for better growth in confined space.
subtasks: Assessing plant density and necessary spacing.
Identifying congested areas among pepper plants.
Determining the optimal time for pruning based on plant growth stage.
Selecting appropriate pruning tools (e.g., scissors, pruning shears).
Removing excess stems or leaves to optimize root space.
Ensuring remaining plants form a single unit for efficient use of space.
